sentences.en: By mid-season the hostility between the two was undisguised.
sentences.cn: 赛季过半时，双方之间的敌意已经公开化了。

sentences.en: Frances beamed at her friend with undisguised admiration.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝开心地对自己的朋友笑着，毫不掩饰她的羡慕之情。

sentences.en: From the start of that campaign, I faced undisguised hostility because of my sex.
sentences.cn: 从竞选一开始, 我就要面对他们毫不掩饰的对女性的敌意.

sentences.en: From the start to that campaign, I faced undisguised hostility because of my sex.
sentences.cn: 从竞选运动一开始我便因是女性而面对毫不掩饰的敌意.

sentences.en: Hean looked down at Bauer in undisguised disgust.
sentences.cn: 希恩低头看了看鲍尔，毫不掩饰自己的厌恶。

sentences.en: Her exultation being quite undisguised was singularly inoffensive.
sentences.cn: 她的欢欣因为是完全不加掩饰的,所以格外不惹人反感.

sentences.en: It is time, sir, to speak the undisguised language of historical truth.
sentences.cn: 阁下, 现在该是毫不掩饰地说清楚历史真相的时候了.

sentences.en: Mr. Lorry immediately remembered, and regarded his new visitor with an undisguised look of abhorrence.
sentences.cn: 罗瑞先生立即想了起来, 用并不掩饰的厌恶之情望了望新来的客人.

sentences.en: Our previous spy shots have revealed a nearly undisguised version of the 2010 GL.
sentences.cn: 我们过去的间谍杆揭示了几乎毫不掩饰的2010年版本的冰川.

sentences.en: She looked at him with immediate and undisguised contempt.
sentences.cn: 她用毫不掩饰的轻蔑眼光看着他.

sentences.en: The sentence is not unusual in the real undisguised.
sentences.cn: 不寻常的一句话却真实得露骨.

sentences.en: There was undisguised contempt in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的语气中带着不加掩饰的轻蔑。

sentences.en: They looked upon the creature with a loathing undisguised.
sentences.cn: 他们流露出明显的厌恶看那动物.

words.tran_cn: 无伪装的；公开的；不戴假面具的

trans.tran_cn: 不加掩饰的，坦率的，公开的，露骨
trans.tran_en: an undisguised feeling is clearly shown and not hidden
